lead_paragraph: Inter Milan Coach Roberto Mancini, who said a day earlier that he was resigning at the end of the season, reversed course, according to Massimo Moratti, the club president. Mancini, who has four years left on his contract, announced his resignation after Tuesday’s defeat to Liverpool in the Champions League.
